entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Mine Centre

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
